description: This sun-soaked unit has 3/4 inch hardwood floors and exposed brick walls throughout the expansive loft space. The generously sized kitchen has an inviting island complete with a breakfast bar, ample cabinets and gas cooking. Unwind in the roomy bedroom accompanied by a sizable walk-in closet. Enjoy the added benefits of an in-unit washer/dryer.

Ideal location for working Downtown/Heights/Medical Center. 2 level modern, serene industrial loft, made of glass, steel and soundproofing concrete. Balancing views with privacy; openness with definition; and light with shade. 512 sq ft elevated Primary bedroom and workspace. Separate yet interactive kitchen area with counter depth stainless steel appliances and oversized quartz counter height bar. Multi-purpose office/ dining/living area with floor to ceiling windows capturing Houston's celebrated - visually striking sunsets. Access to Houston's social summit - rooftop event area with lounge pool, jacuzzi with 2 professional gas grills and outdoor kitchens. Center of Houston's only substantial walking culture with Parks, Dog runs, bars, cafes, outdoor free concerts, dueling piano players, night clubs with a swimming pool, artists thriving and starving, busloads of astounded suburban tourists, theater, musicals, musicians, and the metro rail station.
Zillow has 20 photos of this $224,900 1 bed, 1 bath, 1,242 sqft townhouse home located at 915 N San Jacinto St, Houston, TX 77002 built in 1986. MLS #46301032.

Situated in the vibrant core of Downtown Houston with views of Main Street, this top-floor, updated 2-bedroom, 2-bath loft offers striking design and character. Featuring true industrial elements like dramatic double-height concrete ceilings, exposed brick on two sides, wood floors, and expansive windows that flood the space with sunlight. The main level hosts the kitchen, living, dining areas, and a spacious secondary bedroom. Kitchen updates (per seller, 2017–2018) include custom cabinetry, cement counters, a large butcher block island, and stainless steel appliances. The secondary bedroom includes a study nook and ensuite bath. Upstairs, the primary suite features wood-look tile, a concrete ceiling, and a partial glass wall for added light. Refrigerator, washer, and dryer stay. One parking space, water, sewer, trash, fitness center, rooftop terrace, and lounge.

Experience stunning skyline views from this spacious corner loft at Bayou Lofts. Featuring exposed brick, hardwood floors, and a smart open layout that lives larger than expected. The kitchen offers ample storage, a breakfast bar, and stylish finishes. The owner added a generous walk-in closet in the primary suite, plus a bath with separate tub and shower. Enjoy 24/7 concierge, fitness center, rooftop deck with splash pool, and a private storage cage. Includes two assigned parking spaces - a rare find in Downtown Houston. Located in the Historic District, just steps from Market Square Park, Bravery Chef Hall, dog parks, MetroRail, and all downtown attractions.

Welcome to 2016 Main Street #620! Live in the heart of Midtown Houston in this 2-bed, 2-bath condo, which includes a washer & dryer in the unit, plus a smart split floor plan for added privacy. The custom kitchen features dual ovens and plenty of space to cook and entertain. Enjoy peace of mind with remote-controlled roll-down hurricane shutters on all windows, which lead to the expansive, slate-tiled terrace. Your monthly maintenance fee covers heating/cooling, water, trash, internet, cable, and common area insurance—keeping life simple. This mid/high-rise building offers full amenity living: outdoor pool and hot tub, fitness center, business lounge, and 24/7/365 security with a manned entrance. Convenience, comfort, and security—all in one of Houston’s most connected neighborhoods. Contact us today for a private tour!

Penthouse living with UNPARALLELED views in the heart of Houston. 3 bedrooms and an office with 2-1/2 bathrooms. This property is a dream for people that like to entertain. Spacious and looking for a new owner. HOA FEE INCLUDES: electricity, internet, cable, water, trash (you need a router). COMMUNITY: 24/7/365 courtesy staff, limited access, resident lounge, free coffee bar, pool (currently being renovated), gym, 2 assgn parking spaces, grills, party rm, guest rm, package rm, Amazon Locker. Located on the Rail. Walking distance to: bayou running & cycling trails, midtown/downtown parks & dog parks, eateries, theaters, shopping, hotels, grocery stores and the 7 mile underground tunnel system. Instant access to I-45, I-10, and Hwy 59/288. Close to: Museums, TX Medical Center, UofH (Central and DT), TSU, Rice, St. Thomas, and S. TX. Law, Minute Maid Park, George R Brown and Shell Soccer Stadium. See video!

Stylish 2-bed, 2-bath condo with open-concept living, updated kitchen, granite countertops, wood floors, 3 balconies, and in-unit laundry. Enjoy stunning sunsets and unbeatable walkability to restaurants, pubs, and events. 2016 Main offers resort-style amenities including all utilities, pool, gym, coffee bar, package room, guest suites, and more, with easy access to major highways.

Beautifully renovated 1/1 corner unit at one of Downtown’s most preferred buildings, Hermann Lofts. Highlights include exposed brick walls, soaring 11’ cement ceilings, 10 windows, oak hardwood floors, open LR/DR/Kitchen & abundant storage! Kitchen boasts custom cabinetry, recycled glass countertops, stunning backsplash, gas cooking, refrigerator drawers & one-of-a-kind breakfast bar countertop made from reclaimed boxcar flooring. Bath has custom built vanity with double sinks & recycled glass countertops and oversized walk-in shower with frameless glass enclosure. 1 assigned garage space & storage cage included. Small boutique building of only 24 units. Monthly HOA fee includes building common area insurance & maintenance, water, sewer, trash, gas & fiber optic internet. Superior location in Downtown’s Historic District walkable to MetroRail, Market Sq. Park, POST Houston, Theater District, sporting venues, Buffalo Bayou Park, dining, bars & more! HOA PROHIBITS AIRBNB TYPE RENTALS.
